analysis.description:
PlayerBook.registerNameCore (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#386-421) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- reciverbank.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#409-411)
NameFilter.nameFilter (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#675-780) is declared view but contains assembly code
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddrFromDapp (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#532) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXname (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#291) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXnameFromDapp (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#574) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddr (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#254) is a local variable never initialiazed

PlayerBook.addMeToGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[_gameID].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#335-339)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_laff) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#356-359)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#361-362)

PlayerBook.registerNameCore has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_affID) (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#414)

NameFilter.nameFilter uses assembly (/unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#675-780)
	- /unique_chucks/40/0xe3a09444bc98686e34fc59e3bc517496e20b146a.sol#775-779
